review: I appreciated the personalized approach to my dental needs. Dr.Radha carefully tailored a treatment plan that addressed my concerns,They took the time to explain every step of the procedure, ensuring that I felt comfortable and informed throughout. The attention to detail and commitment to my oral health were truly impressive.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Radha is very friendly and gave good explanation of the dental issues as well as suggested correct treatment for recovery. Hospitality is one of important thing that we expect, so here when I think about it I felt doctor and staffs are great because they did regular follow up with me on my medications and felt good care. Totally the money I spent was worth it for everything. I would recommend everyone who has dental issues to visit this clinic. Thank you to Doctor Radha and staffs for giving good support throughout.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Doctor was zero friendly, and I don't know why they are asking to fill the occupation field in the entry form. I went for tooth ache, she asked to take xray (500) and just straight way asked to do wisdom teeth removal surgery in the pongal holidays (20k way too costly). I went to this doctor just by believing all the reviews posted here, super opposite. She isn't ready to explain to any of the questions or concerns, she just wanted to complete the appointment quick and anything asked, she will be like get the surgery done... I wouldn't recommend this doctor or the hospital to anyone.
reply_text:
Dear Nithya,
For the concern and complaint you have come for I have offered the best solution and if you have any issues regarding the cost mention to you mind you it was including sedation for the best possible way of keeping you completely painless throughout the treatment and ensuring a post operative smooth recovery. Wisdom tooth removal ranges from 1500 here in our centre, we take X-rays see how deep is the impaction look for proximity to nerve and say the cost according to the expertise. Our surgeon is 25year experienced doctor in the field and ensures his best expertise is used. If u had any questions or concerns we are always ready to help. Pls donot question the authenticity of other patients reviews posted here. Thank you for visiting us!!

context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Scaling / Polishing,Wisdom Tooth Extraction,
review: I visited Bhavane clinic for my dental issues. Right from checking-in, x-ray, consultation to treatment, the entire process was very smooth. The facility was well maintained and clean. Dr. Chanaram and Dr.Radha were very professional and knowledgeable. They explained in detail the treatment options available which helped me make an informed decision. Highly recommended and I will visit again for all my future dental needs. They also have a kid friendly space inside the clinic which is a plus!

Coming to clinic review it was very clean. Friendly Staff. Dentist was very nice and informative even if you. They change new Equipment for each patient.  providing an excellent service. Worthfor money. Thank you for giving me back my SMILE.
